body_html:
This could be related to this problem:

https://groups.google.com/forum/#!msg/torch7/kLusyLEj4oc/uwbK1GiQDwAJ

This is an issue associated with kernel version and cuda drivers when multiple GPUs are being used.

Using Nicholas Leonard's instructions at the end solved this issue for me, without having to use CUDA_VISIBLE_DEVICES.

body:
This could be related to this problem:  

https://groups.google.com/forum/#!msg/torch7/kLusyLEj4oc/uwbK1GiQDwAJ

This is an issue associated with kernel version and cuda drivers when multiple GPUs are being used.   

Using Nicholas Leonard's instructions at the end solved this issue for me, without having to use CUDA_VISIBLE_DEVICES.
